name: FairyTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open fairy trivia”
”Alexa, start fairy trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fairy trivia
des:
Ask Alexa to open Fairy Trivia
She will ask how many players (up to 4)
She will ask for a game name for each player
She will then begin the game by asking a question with possible answers.
First to reach 5 points wins!, if you get three wrong you are out. 
Good luck and may you be sprinkled with magical fairy dust! 
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this game as a fun way to learn about the fairy realm. Check out some of our other skills under lifestyle, self improvement.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
